*[[MediaTek#ax]] '''Filogic 330P''' (AX1200/AX2400) - [https://www.amd.com/en/press-releases/2021-11-18-amd-and-mediatek-develop-amd-rz600-series-wi-fi-6e-modules-to-enhance '''AMD RZ600''' Series Wi-Fi 6E Modules] :* [[MediaTek]] '''MT7922A''' • AX2400 2x2 160MHz (M.2 2230/1216) BT 5.2 ::• [[AMD RZ616]] - Wi-Fi 6E Module • WFA111375 (2021-05-03) <!-- 101441 --> :* [[MediaTek]] '''MT7921K''' • AX1200 2x2 80MHz (M.2 2230) BT 5.2 ::• [[AMD RZ608]] - Wi-Fi 6E Module • WFA103759 (2021-05-18) <!-- 16992 -->
{{WiFiCert|WFA111375|05/03/2021|101441}} :[https://api.cert.wi-fi.org/api/certificate/download/public?variantId=102893 WFA103759] (2021-05-18) <!-- *[https://www.amd.com/en/press-releases/2021-11-18-amd-and-mediatek-develop-amd-rz600-series-wi-fi-6e-modules-to-enhance AMD RZ600 Series Wi-Fi 6E Modules Specifications] :Wi-Fi Module / Wi-Fi Specs / M.2 Slots
:;AMD RZ616 Wi-Fi 6E module (Toucan) :Wi-Fi 6E 2x2 / 160MHz Wi-Fi Channels / PHY rate up to 2.4Gbps / M.2 2230 and 1216
:;AMD RZ608 Wi-Fi 6E module :Wi-Fi 6E 2x2 / 80MHz Wi-Fi Channels / PHY rate up to 1.2Gbps / M.2 2230 -->
==Notes== ===Models=== *[[MediaTek MT7922A12L Reference Design]] (NGFF M.2 1216) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7922A12L/ RAS-MT7922A12L] (2021-10-05) • IC ID: 7542A-MT7922A12L :802.11ax (WiFi 6E) BW160 + BT/BLE Combo Card (2TX) *[[MediaTek MT7922A22M Reference Design]] (NGFF M.2 2230) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/RAS-MT7922A22M/ RAS-MT7922A22M] (2021-07-08) • IC ID: 7542A-MT7922A22M :802.11ax (WiFi 6E) BW160 + BT/BLE Combo Card (2TX)
* '''MT7922''' - MediaTek BT chipset BT BB/LM/LL/RF/RF-PHY/HCI :[[MediaTek]] MT7922A / MT7922U • '''Filogic 330P''' :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7922&SUBSYS_792214C3 [14c3:7922/14c3:7922] • [[MediaTek]] MT7922A Wi-Fi 6E <!-- (160MHz) --> :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7922&SUBSYS_380411AD [14c3:7922/11ad:3804] • [[Lite-On]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7922&SUBSYS_53001A3B [14c3:7922/1a3b:5300] • [[AzureWave]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7922&SUBSYS_53011A3B [14c3:7922/1a3b:5301] • [[AzureWave]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0616&SUBSYS_061614C3 [14c3:0616/14c3:0616] • ([[AMD RZ616]]) MT7922A :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0616&SUBSYS_E0C617AA [14c3:0616/17aa:e0c6] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0616&SUBSYS_E0C717AA [14c3:0616/17aa:e0c7] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0616&SUBSYS_E0CB105B [14c3:0616/105b:e0cb] • [[Foxconn]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0616&SUBSYS_E0CD105B [14c3:0616/105b:e0cd] • [[Foxconn]] :• USB\VEN_0E8D&DEV_7922 • [0e8d:7922] • USB 3.0, BT 5.2 • [[MediaTek]] MT7922U Wi-Fi 6E
* '''MT7921''' - MediaTek BT chipset BT BB/LM/LL/RF/RF-PHY/HCI :[[MediaTek]] MT7921AU / MT7921S / MT7921L / MT7921K • '''Filogic 330P''' :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_796114C3 [14c3:7961/14c3:7961] • [[MediaTek]] Wi-Fi 6/6E :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_E0B7105B [14c3:7961/105b:e0b7] • [[Foxconn]] Wi-Fi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_380211AD [14c3:7961/11ad:3802] • [[Lite-On]] MT7921LEN WiFi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46801A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4680] • [[AzureWave]] AW-XB468NF <!-- (ASUS ROG) MT7921LEN Wi-Fi 6/6E --> <!-- Asus WIFI 6 AX + BT 5.2 (2*2) M.2 2230 - WIFI 6 AX+BT5.2 (2*2) M.2 2230 AZWAVE/AW-XB468NF MT7921L --> :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46811A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4681] • [[AzureWave]] MT7921 WiFi 6 :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_46821A3B [14c3:7961/1a3b:4682] • [[AzureWave]] MT7921 (PCIe) :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_381217AA [14c3:7961/17aa:3812] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_7961&SUBSYS_E0BC17AA [14c3:7961/17aa:e0bc] • [[Lenovo]] :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_A608&SUBSYS_A60814C3 [14c3:a608/14c3:a608] • ([[AMD]] RZ608ES) MT7921K :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0608&SUBSYS_060814C3 [14c3:0608/14c3:0608] • ([[AMD RZ608]]) MT7921K :PCI\VEN_14C3&DEV_0608&SUBSYS_E0C517AA [14c3:0608/17aa:e0c5] • [[Lenovo]]
